how-to: To list your venue go to OpenStreetMap editor and add payment:bitcoin=yes tag to it (or payment:litecoin=yes for Litecoin), (or payment:peercoin=yes for Peercoin).
please-on-ground: Please don't create new venues unless they have physical presence on ground!
every-hour: Venue data are updated every hour. Currently there are
